headline: Crown Castle: Buy While The Market Is Missing The Turnaround
summary: Crown Castle focuses on U.S. cell towers, plans a fiber divestiture, and raised guidance on site rentals, EBITDA, and AFFO. Check out why CCI stock is a buy.

headline: Fed Cleared For Descent
summary: U.S. stocks hit record highs as cooling inflation signals possible Fed rate cuts.

headline: Crown Castle: Turnaround Continues, But Valuation Leaves Little Room For Error
summary: Crown Castle lifted 2025 AFFO guidance and plans to use ~$6B in divestiture proceeds to reduce debt and improve their balance sheet. Read more on CCI stock here.
